title: Pickled Daikon and Carrots
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - 1 large daikon, peeled, seeded, and shredded
directions: 1. Combine the vinegar, 1½ cups of water, the sugar, and salt in a medium bowl and whisk until dissolved.
2. Combine the carrots and daikon in a bowl, pour the pickling liquid over them, cover, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour and up to 1 week.
